title: Nolan at sixty
creator_credit: Brian Adams, ABC and RM Productions
brief_description: The Australian artist, Sidney Nolan, returns home to receive an honorary doctorate of letters from Sydney University. Looks at his life and works and follows his travels and activities in Australia, England and Africa. Narrated by Kenneth Clark.
description: The Australian artist, Sidney Nolan, returns home to receive an honorary doctorate of letters from Sydney University. Looks at his life and works and follows his travels and activities in Australia, England and Africa. Narrated by Kenneth Clark.
